content: Convert the time 9:22am UTC to the time in Melbourne.

Melbourne operates on Australian Eastern Standard Time (AEST), which is UTC+10, or Australian Eastern Daylight Time (AEDT), which is UTC+11, depending on the time of year due to daylight saving.

- If it is during the standard time period (typically from the first Sunday in April to the first Sunday in October), Melbourne is 10 hours ahead of UTC.
- If it is during daylight saving time (typically from the first Sunday in October to the first Sunday in April), Melbourne is 11 hours ahead of UTC.

Given the time of 9:22 AM UTC:

1. If it is during standard time (AEST), the time in Melbourne would be 7:22 PM.
2. If it is during daylight saving time (AEDT), the time in Melbourne would be 8:22 PM.

Make sure to check the current date to determine whether daylight saving time is in effect.
